sdt_assembly_id.description: Unique text identifier for the assembly (Primary key)

sdt_strain_name.description: Strain name from which the assembly was derived (foreign key to Strain.name).

n_contigs.description: Number of contigs in the assembly

link.description: Reference to the actual assembly data

sdt_asv_id.description: Unique identifier for each ASV/OTU (Primary key)

sdt_asv_name.description: Unique name assigned to the ASV/OTU, usually md5sum

sdt_bin_id.description: Unique identifier for the bin (Primary key)

sdt_bin_name.description: Human-readable, unique name for the bin

sdt_assembly_name.description: Identifier of the metagenomic assembly that the bin belongs to (foreign key to Assembly.name)

contigs.description: Array of contig identifiers included in the bin

sdt_community_id.description: Unique internal identifier for the community (Primary key)

community_type_sys_oterm_id.description: Type of community, e.g., isolate or enrichment

community_type_sys_oterm_name.description: Type of community, e.g., isolate or enrichment

sdt_sample_name.description: Reference to the Sample from which the community was obtained.

parent_sdt_community_name.description: Reference to the name of a parent community, establishing hierarchical relationships

sdt_condition_name.description: Reference to the experimental or environmental condition associated with the community

defined_sdt_strain_names.description: List of strains that comprise the community, if the community is defined

sdt_community_description.description: Free-text field providing additional details or notes about the community

sdt_condition_id.description: Unique identifier for the condition (Primary key)

sdt_condition_name.description: Unique text name describing the condition

sdt_dubseq_library_name.description: Unique, human-readable name of the DubSeq library

sdt_genome_name.description: Foreign key to the associated genome (Genome.name) from which the library was derived

n_fragments.description: Number of unique DNA fragments in the library

sdt_gene_id.description: Unique internal identifier for the gene (Primary key)

sdt_gene_name.description: Unique external identifier for the gene

sdt_genome_name.description: Name of the genome to which the gene belongs (foreign key)

aliases.description: List of alternative names or identifiers for the gene

contig_number.description: Contigs are indexed starting at 1, as in KBase

strand.description: DNA strand of the gene (+ for forward, - for reverse)

start.description: Genomic start coordinate on the contig, indexed starting at 1 as in KBase

stop.description: Genomic stop coordinate in base pairs

function.description: Annotated biological function of the gene

sdt_genome_id.description: Unique identifier for the genome (Primary key)

sdt_strain_name.description: Name of the microbial strain associated with the genome (foreign key)

n_contigs.description: Number of contigs in the genome assembly

n_features.description: Number of annotated features (e.g., genes) in the genome

link.description: Link to where the genome itself is actually stored

sdt_image_id.description: Unique identifier for each image (Primary key)

sdt_image_name.description: Unique name (e.g., filename) for the image.

mime_type.description: MIME type specifying the image file format (e.g., image/jpeg)

size.description: File size of the image measured in bytes

dimensions.description: Image dimensions (e.g., width × height) expressed in pixels

link.description: URL or file path linking to the stored image

sdt_location_id.description: Unique identifier for the location (Primary key)

latitude.description: Latitude of the location in decimal degrees

longitude.description: Longitude of the location in decimal degrees

continent_sys_oterm_id.description: Continent where the location is situated

continent_sys_oterm_name.description: Continent where the location is situated

feature_sys_oterm_id.description: Environmental or geographic feature at the location

feature_sys_oterm_name.description: Environmental or geographic feature at the location

sdt_protocol_id.description: Unique identifier for the protocol (Primary key)

sdt_protocol_name.description: Unique, human-readable name of the protocol

link.description: URL linking to additional documentation of the protocol, such as protocols.io

sdt_reads_id.description: Unique identifier for each reads dataset (Primary key)

link.description: Link to the reads file (e.g., fastq)

sdt_sample_id.description: Unique identifier for the sample (Primary key)

sdt_location_name.description: Location where the sample was collected (Foreign key)

depth.description: For below-ground samples, the average distance below ground level in meters where the sample was taken

elevation.description: For above-ground samples, the average distance above ground level in meters where the sample was taken

env_package_sys_oterm_id.description: MIxS environmental package classification of the sample

env_package_sys_oterm_name.description: MIxS environmental package classification of the sample

sdt_sample_description.description: Free-form description or notes about the sample

sdt_strain_id.description: Unique identifier for each strain (Primary key)

sdt_genome_name.description: Genome object for sequenced, wild type strains

derived_from_sdt_strain_name.description: Name of the parent strain from which this strain was derived, if created by genetic modification or similar process

sdt_gene_names_changed.description: List of gene identifiers that have been altered in this strain, if created by genetic modification, if known

sdt_taxon_id.description: Unique identifier for a taxon record (Primary key)

sdt_taxon_name.description: Unique taxon name, typically the scientific name

ncbi_taxid.description: NCBI taxonomy identifier for the taxon, if available

sdt_tnseq_library_name.description: Unique, human-readable name of the TnSeq library

sdt_genome_name.description: Foreign key to the associated genome (Genome.name) from which the library was derived

primers_model.description: Type of primers used to generate the library

n_mapped_reads.description: Number of reads that mapped to the reference genome

n_barcodes.description: Total number of distinct barcode sequences detected in the library

n_usable_barcodes.description: Number of barcodes deemed usable after quality filtering

n_insertion_locations.description: Number of distinct transposon insertion sites identified in the library

hit_rate_essential.description: Proportion of essential genes with at least one transposon insertion

hit_rate_other.description: Proportion of non-essential (other) genes with at least one transposon insertion
